The problem:

In the African region, under 5 mortality rates continue well above those in ""developed"" countries. Current measures of under 5 mortality in sub-Saharan Africa estimate them at 15 times as high. Across the world, this equates to 5 children dying every minute, half of whom are in the African region. Additionally recent studies throughout the region report inadequate qualified paediatric personnel and clinical care but governments are doing little to address this.
In response, Baby Steps and Big Dreams has two major focuses:
1. Promoting paediatric education through the provision of scholarships
2. Fostering a spirit of advocacy and improvement in child health workers

What We Need:

Funds to get the ball rolling:

  • Scholarships: This is the initial and MOST PRESSING issue. We have a scholarship student set to start paediatric residency this fall whose participation in the programs is DEPENDENT on raising funds for a September deadline.
  • Startup: Remaining funds will be invested to help defray the legal costs establishing tax-exempt NGO status
• Advocacy: Remaining funds will help to set up awards for local innovative advocacy projects aimed at improving child health.

The Impact:

Baby Steps and Big Dreams tries to acts locally and accountably to foster expertise, advocacy and leadership in those who think globally. It works to build leaders from within communities rather than from the outside.
Your initial donations will go directly to Dr Faith Mosha's tuition fees as she embarks on her pediatric residency. Here is a word from Dr Mosha:

""Hello. My name is Dr Faith A Mosha, a medical doctor (and aspiring Pediatrician) working at Kilimanjaro Christian Medical Centre in Moshi, Tanzania. My background includes graduating as a Doctor of Medicine from Kilimanjaro Christian Medical University College in Moshi in 2012, and a postgraduate diploma in East African Tropical Medicine and Hygiene.

Pediatrics is an important profession in our society. Child health is very crucial in the upbringing of our children. The majority of the population of Tanzania is children but there is only one specialist for every 66,000. My ambition is to be one of the few Pediatricians who will make a difference, help children have better health so they can have better futures and help bring change and development. Growing up and studying in a developing country has put me face to face with the serious challenges and disadvantages we have. The under-fives mortality rate in Tanzania is 1 in 20 children, and that figure increases amongst the most vulnerable and those with limited access to medical care. Tanzania is a third world country, we are still developing and we need our children to be brought up in a healthy, caring and conducive environment as they are the pillars of the future. My goal is to be able to treat and manage our children, reach out to those in need, to those unable to seek medical care due to various financial, socio-economic and personal reasons, to educate the parents/care-takers on the importance of their child’s health so as to build a better future for them and enable them to grow up and get the chance to live a healthy, happy life like all the other children out there. Being able to bring a smile to that sweet, innocent face of a child, see them play around, being active and most of all, not having a future that is limited by the absence of a dedicated health care provider for them.

I have recently applied for a four year postgraduate degree in Masters of Medicine in Pediatrics and Child Health at Kilimanjaro Christian Medical University College for this academic year 2015/2016, commencing in October 2015. Being able to achieve my goal and reach out to children and families in need
column2: that is what I want to do, to bring something good into the world, to bring a change.""

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't contribute, you can still help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise, send emails, post us on social media...
  • Contact us for other ways to help getting things off the ground
<div>
About me:

I am a paediatrician (and tireless dreamer) currently based out of Calgary, Alberta. Playing a small role and acting locally for global health has been a lifelong ambition. My background includes a Bacherlor's in the diagnosis and remediation of children with learning disabilities from Northwestern University, Medical School at McGill University and paediatric residency and fellowship at the Alberta Children's Hospital.  I have completed additional global health training, with my East African Diploma of Tropical Medicine with the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, Certificate in Humanitarian Response with the Harvard Humanitarian Institute and volunteering ""on the ground"" in various sites from Kathmandu, Nepal to Brazilian rainforest to the streets of Port-Au-Prince. During this time I've started to create my own vision and ideas for ways to contribute to global child health in a responsible and sustainable manner...Baby Steps and Big Dreams is the initial incarnation of those ideals.

column11: >Zuddha is fully funded! We couldn't have done it without you guys. Thank you all so much!

column1:
Two and a half years ago, co-founder Tyson Adams walked the streets of Bangkok looking for coconut oil.  When he discovered what would later become Zuddha, it was pure bliss: the oil was noticeably different in taste, smell and texture.

Back in Seattle several months later, Tyson searched high and low for something like it, but no other oils could hold a candle to the memory of that Bangkok coconut oil. Impassioned by the desire to import it to America, Tyson traveled back to Thailand to visit the farm and factory, and eventually partnered with the Thai family who crafts Zuddha.
<div>
<div>
The Blind Taste Test Challenge
WATCH THIS VIDEO! Just kidding, YOU REALLY MUST SEE THIS!
<div>
What is it Good For?
Absolutely everything!
Our Small Batch Process

Our small-batch, raw-qualified processing is a revolutionary technology. Zuddha's oil extraction method is superior to all other coconut oil brands, and you will immediately smell and taste the difference. Get ready for a surprise!
Score these Rewards
Coconut Oil

Zuddha exclusively uses single-origin, old-grove, organic, 100% premium Thai coconuts. Unlike some other brands, we do not use any rancid coconuts, meaning our oil is unrefined, unbleached and non-deodorized. We are redefining virgin coconut oil through our 15-step, small batch, raw-qualified process, which uses centrifugal extraction and a fast-freezing cold-pressed method to avoid the prevailing use of high heat and chemicals.

This technique keeps more beneficial nutrients and fatty acids (MCTs) intact and bioavailable. The effect is a superb experience unlike any you’ve ever tasted in coconut oil. Eaten by the spoonful, you will immediately notice its silky smooth consistency with a very mild coconut aroma and no aftertaste. Pure, simple, unequalled... nirvana!
Apron
Your choice of apron color (gray/khaki), logo color (white/green) &
column2: pockets or no pockets. Email us if you would like to see the other options! Made in the U.S.A.

column1: Coconut Flower Nectar

Zuddha Coconut Flower Nectar is a sugar and honey alternative that is absolutely delicious. The nectar comes naturally from the inflorescence of coconut palm trees, which is the cluster of flowers which make up the reproductive parts of the tree. The coconut palm trees use the nectar to produce coconuts, but it can also be harvested.

When eaten by the spoonful, it has hints of butterscotch and caramel, which adds a wholesome richness to any recipe. As a totally natural, low-glycemic sweetener, it can replace any liquid sweeteners at a 1:1 ratio.
Sharing is Caring

column8: >We donate 1% to The Ayurvedic Institute (non-profit) who promotes the use of coconut oil for whole body wellness.

>DOMESTIC 
Domestic shipping is FREE in the United States.

column1: Straight up guys, international shipping is complicated. In addition to shipping costs, some countries may have customs clearance, duties and taxes. Here is what we are going to do to make it fair for everyone. For international shipping, there will be an additional cost that you will be required to pay via paypal before we will ship out your order. Once we have your order prepared, we will find you the cheapest shipping quote (USPS, UPS or FedEx) and send it to you. Then you pay it and we send you the perks + a tracking number. Questions? Email us.

Let's save our bottoms with BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus!!

 

 

BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus is a cushion ergonomically designed for correcting body posture. It supports the correct pelvis position in an optimal posture to make your body be with the right position at any time, anywhere.

BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus is made of air-cell VETAGEL®. VETAGEL® is 99% antibacterial high elastic special polymer combined with the skin irritation-free oil that is used in beauty products. With its unique features, the cushion is distortion-free and could withstand high temperature up to 158℉. The honeycomb structure of the air-cell VETAGEL® provides the optimum dispersion of pressure applied to the hips and thighs, helping to reduce pressure on the skin and blood vessels.

 

 

Uncomfortable bottom = neck, back, and muscle pains

 

Sitting all day is the main culprit, thanks to our sedentary lifestyles and jobs that tie us to a desk or driver’s seat from 9 to 5 (if not longer).  Sitting for too long can have short and long-term effects on your health and body, making this seemingly benign activity potentially deadly. It can tighten the hip flexor and hamstring muscles and stiffen the joints themselves. Plus, the uncomfortable bottom could contribute to lower back pain and knee stiffness, scourges that many people suffer from every day.

 

Gluteal Amnesia, aka “Dead butt syndrome”, is a real thing!!

 

Sitting so long that our butts are literally falling asleep. “Dead butt syndrome,” or gluteal amnesia, is a condition that occurs when your gluteus medius gets inflamed and forgets to function normally. Sitting too long can restrict the blood flow, causing gluteal amnesia, which can lead to hip pain, lower backache and problems with your ankles. We are not magicians, we can not offer you apple bottom but, we can help you to reduce the pain and possible gluteal amnesia with BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus.

 

 

 

Weight is just another word for the force of gravity. If we can't control our weight/gravity and if we can't cut our time sitting down, let's try to fight gravity by dispersing gravity! Now, start Anti-gravity-stress free life with BalanceOn! At home, at work, and even in the car, say goodbye to tired sitting.

 

The high-density and high-elasticity of the double-layers honeycomb structure of the air-cell VETAGEL® provide the optimum dispersion of pressure applied to the hips and thighs, helping to reduce pressure on the skin and blood vessels.  It will be very beneficial for wheelchair-bound patients with paralysis, preventing physical deformities such as scoliosis, bedsores, and also promoting musculoskeletal system stability.

 

 

 

Based on the findings, the vehicle vibration can produce a physiological and psychological effect on humans. Vibration can disturb the stability of attention and increase the drowsiness and mental load and serious physical problems ranging from chronic back pain to nerve damage. The combination increases stress and load on the neck, shoulder, and lower back. Outstanding elasticity of double-layers disperses and absorbs micro-vibration. Ability to absorb continuous vibration by motor vehicle driving. Absorption of vibration will reduce back and leg pain from a long term driving.

 

 

Central air-hole gives you pleasant sitting by depressing the pressure on the bottom of the upper body. Maximizing the airflow, allowing you to sit on a temperature-neutral surface. No more sweaty bottom from retained body heat.

 

 

 

 

Ergonomically designed for correcting body posture. The high elasticity of the VETAGEL® perfectly holds the pelvis and posture in every movement. All edges are rounded and placed under your thighs for keeping an optimal posture to provide pleasant seating. It supports the correct pelvis position in an optimal posture to make your body be with the right position at any time, anywhere.

 

Long-term use of the product won’t affect the elasticity or the resilience of the product. It’s durable and won’t develop a body impression. It could be used at high temperature (up to 158°F) without distortion.

 

The properties of VETAGEL® are 99% antibacterial so, no need to worry about dust mites and germ build-ups. Wash it when you feel the need, wash it again if you spilled something, it’s very simple! Take control of your own long-lasting cushion.

 

Covers

 

Applied NST-1000+ Non-Slip technology on the undercover, BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus prevents the slip and keep a correct posture, being fixed on the chair. BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus will come up with 2 new colors, Navy and Brown. These two colors of the cushion will be a better fit for the car!

 

 

Double-layers of honeycomb structures are world patent technology developed by millions of 3D graphic design tests. Hexagonal shapes are for withstanding weight (buckling &
column2:
compression) of building in architectural engineering.

 

The BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus is made with the high-density and high-elasticity of the double-layers honeycomb structure of the air-cell VETAGEL®. The thickness of the two layers is slightly different. With numerous studies,1.5mm thickness of the top layer of the cell wall provided the most comfortable, smooth sitting for the hip. The bottom layer of the cell wall was made slightly thicker to disperse the absorbed body weight and also for its durability and elasticity.

 

 

 

 

 

Approved tests

 

 

 

Thesis

 

  • Medicine

 

  • AHFE

 

 

 

The first creation of the BalanceOn Fit Seat was sold in Amazon. The consumers were very satisfied with the comfort that was given but, plead for a bigger size. We decided to come up with a new product, BalanceOn Fit Seat Plus. It is simply bigger and better with different colors of the seat cover.
column3: >**These are actual reviews from BalanceOn Fit Seat (2nd Generation) users**
column4:
> 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bullsone is a Korean manufacturer of automotive goods. The driver’s safety, comfort, and pleasure of driving is the core value of Bullsone. No matter how well the car is made, we experience back pain, shoulder contractions, and leg cramps while driving. To provide the best experience for the drivers, we have studied and researched to reduce the pain while driving/sitting. BalanceOn is a new establishment from Bullsone, promoting comfort and health for everyone. Multi-layer Honey Comb Technology and air-cell VETAGEL® are applied to total healthcare solutions, BalanceOn. It is ergonomically designed for correcting body posture, supporting correct pelvis position in an optimal posture to make your body be with the right position at any time, anywhere. Our philosophy is to achieve a healthy lifestyle through a balance of mind and body with BalanceOn.

Short Summary

Hi!  We (Lacey and Kristi) got inspired as owners of a spa to create a line better than what we were able to find.  It's simple.  We want better ingredients and better packaging.  Key items of importance to us include:
<ul>
• Ingredients in a body butter and bath bombs that actually nourish the skin with oils and vitamins
• Light scents that take you to a place of relaxation and escape
• Minimal packaging with recyclable materials (when possible)
• Simple, classic, and pretty packaging.   Add to the aesthetic of your space!
<h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>

• Our number one goal is to get the minimum funds to start the body butter order.  We have to order a minimum of 5 gallons of each of the 3 scents.   ALL purchases will help with this even if you don't want to order the body butter.
• Number 2 is a bath bomb press which will allow us to make 3 times as many bath bombs in the same amount of time and probably save some of Lacey's sanity.

• Anything beyond these 2 goals will go towards materials to make more product and towards marketing to get our brand out there!  Our first outreach with marketing will target  boutiques, spas and gift shops like our own that have difficulty finding quality products that still sell wholesale and don't have a ridiculously high minimum order.  We want to be part of the small business movement that allows owners to bring in quality options without going bankrupt.
• Want a full description and to see what you will receive?  Please visit www.evolvebnb.com!
<h3>Risks &amp

There are a lot of other companies out there creating these types of products.  One of the biggest challenges is to create something that can stand out and be worth it's price.  We've spent almost 3 years owning a spa that is constantly searching for these types of products we have purchased and compared many competitor's brands.
<ul>

<li>Risk:  High overhead.  Solution:  We make 2/3 of our product in the spa and also sell it there so we have very low overhead.  The other 1/3 will be an initially large purchase which is a risk but we will sell it &amp
column2: use it at the spa and will sell to other businesses.

column1: • Challenge:  Getting into wholesale businesses.  Solution:  1-We already did 1 trade show and have several businesses that purchased from us.  2-Indigo Fair-we will enroll in this online store that connects small businesses with wholesalers.

• Challenge:  Keeping up with production and fulfilling orders.  Solution:  streamline production process with bath bomb press and have a financial cushion to pre-make candles so we have a decent inventory and can just ship.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
<ul>
• Share our facebook page, instagram page and website!  Someone you know might love what we have to offer even if it isn't something you are interested in purchasing!
• instagram:  evolve_bnb
• facebook:  @evolvebnb
• website:  www.evolvebnb.com (can't purchase online just yet though!)
","Short Summary

Hi!  We (Lacey and Kristi) got inspired as owners of a spa to create a line better than what we were able to find.  It's simple.  We want better ingredients and better packaging.  Key items of importance to us include:
Ingredients in a body butter and bath bombs that actually nourish the skin with oils and vitamins
Light scents that take you to a place of relaxation and escape
Minimal packaging with recyclable materials (when possible)
Simple, classic, and pretty packaging.   Add to the aesthetic of your space!
What We Need & What You Get

Our number one goal is to get the minimum funds to start the body butter order.  We have to order a minimum of 5 gallons of each of the 3 scents.   ALL purchases will help with this even if you don't want to order the body butter.
Number 2 is a bath bomb press which will allow us to make 3 times as many bath bombs in the same amount of time and probably save some of Lacey's sanity.

Anything beyond these 2 goals will go towards materials to make more product and towards marketing to get our brand out there!  Our first outreach with marketing will target  boutiques, spas and gift shops like our own that have difficulty finding quality products that still sell wholesale and don't have a ridiculously high minimum order.  We want to be part of the small business movement that allows owners to bring in quality options without going bankrupt.
Want a full description and to see what you will receive?  Please visit www.evolvebnb.com!
Risks & Challenges

There are a lot of other companies out there creating these types of products.  One of the biggest challenges is to create something that can stand out and be worth it's price.  We've spent almost 3 years owning a spa that is constantly searching for these types of products we have purchased and compared many competitor's brands.

Risk:  High overhead.  Solution:  We make 2/3 of our product in the spa and also sell it there so we have very low overhead.  The other 1/3 will be an initially large purchase which is a risk but we will sell it & use it at the spa and will sell to other businesses.

Challenge:  Getting into wholesale businesses.  Solution:  1-We already did 1 trade show and have several businesses that purchased from us.  2-Indigo Fair-we will enroll in this online store that connects small businesses with wholesalers.

Challenge:  Keeping up with production and fulfilling orders.  Solution:  streamline production process with bath bomb press and have a financial cushion to pre-make candles so we have a decent inventory and can just ship.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Share our facebook page, instagram page and website!  Someone you know might love what we have to offer even if it isn't something you are interested in purchasing!

ERIN LOZIER

Erin Lozier mother of Asher Lozier born on April 4,2013 has been diagnosed with Vestibular Schwannoma (acoustic neuroma)  this is a form of a non-cancerous brain tumor that is wrapped around her auditory, facial, and balancing nerve. At this point the tumor is medium size and is pressing against her brain and has already caused her to have permanent hearing loss in her right ear.  Erin and her husband Cody will be traveling to the House Ear Clinic in Los Angeles to have surgery to remove the tumor on June 4 2013, we are trying to raise funds to help will their traveling expenses and the many medical bills that will follow the surgery.  With this surgery recovery is known to take several months.  The purpose of this campaign is to help a young couple with a brand new baby enjoy their new life together without the stress of making ends meet during this difficult time in their lives.

Hi, My name is Drew and I am trying to get everyone to become part of the Dwattle Revolution!

Staying hydrated is extremely important for staying healthy and fit, but carrying those rigid plastic water bottles everywhere is a pain, not to mention what these rigid plastic bottles do to our landfills, lakes, streams and wooded areas for our generation and generations to come.

My friends and I figured the easiest way to carry water with us would be in the de-hydrated state but the problem being every time we tried to re-hydrate it, the water would run through our fingers and we were left with nothing to drink and unable to hydrate ourselves.

After a lot of thought we decided that what we needed was a type of container that is earth friendly (reusable) and fun to carry. What we came up with is what we call a de-hydrated water bottle because it lays flat when its empty (de-hydrated) and stands up when its full (hydrated). Much like our bodies when we are hydrated we feel full of energy and standing tall, but when we are de-hydrated we feel weak and flat.
Since
column4: >ttle, is a lot for us to pronounce properly we decided to simply call it The Dwattle!

column1: This unique product can go every where with you, from camping (replace the ice cubes in your cooler with a frozen Dwattle), biking, jogging or any sport that you can think of as well as the gym just to name a few.
The ""Dwattle"" comes dehydrated, to re-hydrate simply add oxidane or hydrogen hydroxide.
Add what?  You say! Most of usually refer to these two relatively unknown chemicals as water or h2o.
Everyone will love the clever and informative re-hydration instructions printed on every Dwattle bottle.

When de-hydrated (empty) the Dwattle bottle lays flat or roles up, allowing very easy storage and transport, and taking up far less space than do rigid bottles. The Dwattle stands up when hydrated, or you can use the provided carabineer style clip to hang wherever most convenient.

This colorful little re-hydration machine is BPA free, easily cleaned in the top rack of your dishwasher, freezable for keeping everything cold in your cooler without that soggy mess ice cubes can cause. As the ice melts in your Dwattle bottle, you have ice cold, thirst quenching, water without wasting a drop of our precious drinking water.
The Dwattle gives Mother Nature a bit of a break by being reusable over and over and requiring less energy to manufacture than do rigid bottles.
We are now asking everyone who understands the importance of staying hydrated to join our Campaign and help us bring this unique product the rest of the way to market.
After much reserch we finalized our design and started the manufacturing process of the Dwattle. In other words we finally brought the Dwattle to life!!
In order for us to continue we need your help!
Manufacturing is costly and our budget is low, your contributions to our campaign would greatly appreciated!
All contributions will be used for:
Manufacturing of the Dwattle
Packaging
Web design and maintenance
Marketing
And Legal.

We know time are tight and not every one that may want to contribute funds to our campaign can. So if you cannot contribute funds we ask you to help use get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and please use the Indiegogo share tools.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div class=""full-description"">
What is Refine For Men?

Refine for men is a simplistic but effective complexion enhancer designed specifically for the modern day man. Our goal is to aid men by fixing any facial imperfections they may have in order to achieve that ""refined"" look. To be perfectly clear Refine is NOT an acne treatment product, but a supplement to help improve one's skin. Refine CAN however help you conceal any facial imperfections and blemishes, for a more Refined you, a Better you.
Why Use Refine?

It seems to be that now, more than ever, appearance influences our first impression of other people, more than we'd like to admit . Since we inadvertently judge the book by its cover, why not make that cover as appealing as possible? Whether it's for a first date or an important job interview Refine can help you feel more prepared for what ever situation life throws at you.
Why Now?

At first glance, this may be a strange concept for most men to grasp. Putting on any complexion product is not a typical part of a man's morning routine. But this social faux pas can change just as the use of skinny jeans and earrings
column2: items once considered only for women are now worn and accepted by everyone. With a product that can only improve your appearance why let a simple temporary social standard stop you from grasping the opportunity to look better? Complexion enhancers for the male market are already emerging overseas, but their design choices do not appeal to the male audience. They use all sorts of compactors, mirrors, and brushes that are reminiscent of female makeup. Refine's packaging is of a more discrete nature blending in with toiletries, other skin care products, or the items on your shelf. Just think of Refine as another step in your morning routine. Apply once a day, and you'll have Refine acting as a shield protecting you from all the dirt and grime in the world.

column1: Usage: Fast.Simple.Manly

Using Refine is short and simple process.  First, wash your hands and face (remember to pat, not wipe your face dry) then unscrew the case and dab a small amount on your finger tips. Then apply it as if it were any other lotion and rub until the powder is no longer visible on the face.
Refined Specs:
We Proudly Offer:
100% Natural: 100% mineral, non-comedogenic product.
Zinc Oxide: an FDA-approved skin protectant that offers anti-inflammatory properties that reduce the irritation associated with acne breakouts.
Titanium Dioxide: acts as a natural sunblock, offering coverage from the sun's harmful rays.
Our products do not include: preservatives, parabans, mineral oil, chemical dyes, fillers and fragrances all which can aggravate skin.
Rewards!
<div id=""risks"">
<h3 class=""dotty"">
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
One of the good things that Refine For Men has already accomplished is overcoming the hurdle of any obscuring challenges.

As a company we have already laid out all of the steps necessary for the smooth production of an innovated product. Some of the risks that our company faces in successfully accomplishing the kickstarter project is mainly the possibility of error that comes with the manufacturing of any product. Any possibility of error at any step within the process of production can delay the completion of our product a few days or even a couple weeks.

We feel that it is important to note to you that the estimated time of completion is based on the the initial $3,000 we plan to raise. Now, if we are able to go beyond expectation in the goal we have set for the funding of our product, manufacturing time for the amount of production could possibly increase. The higher the quantity of production, the more accumulated time we might need to produce the product to the best of its quality. Nonetheless, our product will be successfully completed.
","What is Refine For Men?

Refine for men is a simplistic but effective complexion enhancer designed specifically for the modern day man. Our goal is to aid men by fixing any facial imperfections they may have in order to achieve that ""refined"" look. To be perfectly clear Refine is NOT an acne treatment product, but a supplement to help improve one's skin. Refine CAN however help you conceal any facial imperfections and blemishes, for a more Refined you, a Better you.
Why Use Refine?

It seems to be that now, more than ever, appearance influences our first impression of other people, more than we'd like to admit . Since we inadvertently judge the book by its cover, why not make that cover as appealing as possible? Whether it's for a first date or an important job interview Refine can help you feel more prepared for what ever situation life throws at you.
Why Now?

At first glance, this may be a strange concept for most men to grasp. Putting on any complexion product is not a typical part of a man's morning routine. But this social faux pas can change just as the use of skinny jeans and earrings
column2: items once considered only for women are now worn and accepted by everyone. With a product that can only improve your appearance why let a simple temporary social standard stop you from grasping the opportunity to look better? Complexion enhancers for the male market are already emerging overseas, but their design choices do not appeal to the male audience. They use all sorts of compactors, mirrors, and brushes that are reminiscent of female makeup. Refine's packaging is of a more discrete nature blending in with toiletries, other skin care products, or the items on your shelf. Just think of Refine as another step in your morning routine. Apply once a day, and you'll have Refine acting as a shield protecting you from all the dirt and grime in the world.

column1: Usage: Fast.Simple.Manly
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GWpBp14VRXo&feature=plcp

Using Refine is short and simple process.  First, wash your hands and face (remember to pat, not wipe your face dry) then unscrew the case and dab a small amount on your finger tips. Then apply it as if it were any other lotion and rub until the powder is no longer visible on the face.
Refined Specs:
We Proudly Offer:
100% Natural: 100% mineral, non-comedogenic product.
Zinc Oxide: an FDA-approved skin protectant that offers anti-inflammatory properties that reduce the irritation associated with acne breakouts.
Titanium Dioxide: acts as a natural sunblock, offering coverage from the sun's harmful rays.
Our products do not include: preservatives, parabans, mineral oil, chemical dyes, fillers and fragrances all which can aggravate skin.
Rewards!
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
One of the good things that Refine For Men has already accomplished is overcoming the hurdle of any obscuring challenges.

As a company we have already laid out all of the steps necessary for the smooth production of an innovated product. Some of the risks that our company faces in successfully accomplishing the kickstarter project is mainly the possibility of error that comes with the manufacturing of any product. Any possibility of error at any step within the process of production can delay the completion of our product a few days or even a couple weeks.

We feel that it is important to note to you that the estimated time of completion is based on the the initial $3,000 we plan to raise. Now, if we are able to go beyond expectation in the goal we have set for the funding of our product, manufacturing time for the amount of production could possibly increase. The higher the quantity of production, the more accumulated time we might need to produce the product to the best of its quality. Nonetheless, our product will be successfully completed.",7.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Los Angeles, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/refine-for-men-the-first-complexion-enhancer-specifically-made-for-men/pica

What Is This All About?
Hello! I'm Kym, a 19-year-old college student at Boise State University.

I recently went to the doctor and mentioned a breast lump. Skipping all of the medical mumbo-jumbo, it needs to be removed. They don't know if it's cancerous because I've decided to skip a needle biopsy and go right to the surgical biopsy (because it's cheaper).
Due to my insurance plan, I will be paying the whole thing out of pocket (excluding a few small discounts that the insurance company can give me).
So, what it comes down to is that I have a required surgery that will cost between $5200 and $5700, not including the $500 already paid in exams.
<div>
Perks?
I have little to give, but here are some goals and what you can get from me:

column2: >$1: Any amount will get you a nice THANK YOU from me.
>$15: I will write a poem for you and recite it on my second channel.
>$25: I will mail you a picture that I've drawn for you. I suck at drawing, but it may be fun!
>$50: I will mail you a picture, poem, and make you a video.
>$100: I WILL LOVE YOU SO MUCH AND WILL SPEND DAYS TALKING ABOUT YOU. (No really. You would be my hero.)
>$500: I will probably make you the godparent of my firstborn.
>$1000 or more: My firstborn may be named after you.

column1: <div>
Other Ways You Can Help

In the past I have run for King of the Web, which grants money to YouTubers. I'm going to leave my King of the Web campaign open. If you would like to vote this could be a non-money way to help (although I won't be actively campaigning and winning is unlikely).
Here is the link to vote: http://kingofweb.com/users/themunchkym
I'm extremely shy about asking for money, but I intend to thank every single one of you who donates because I cannot express how much it would mean to me. Every dollar helps. Thank you.

www.bethanylanger.com
Check out my blog and website for updates, I will be posting several times a week!


Who Am I?

Hi, I'm Bethany! I'm a student studying Somatic Psychology, and healing trauma through the body.

I am going to Kauai this spring for a deep, loving and transformative 6-week Yogalign teacher training, and I need your help to get there!


My Yoga Story...

I took my first yoga class eight years ago, and since then my practice has been constantly evolving. However, one thing has not changed: the bliss and ever-present peace that some time on my mat provides me.

As I've deepened my practice throughout the years and delve deeper into studying the body, I've found what works for me and what doesn't. I don't believe in controlling our bodies, but allowing ourselves to surrender and connect to the world around us.

I want to bring to my yoga classes a movement practice that is alive, fluid, and vibrant! I believe our bodies are meant to move, and that the original yoga was simply a dance.

My highest intention is to be a teacher that doesn't simply tell others what to do, but one who creates a space that allows students to connect to themselves, and realize that their body is their greatest teacher.


All About Yogalign
Founder Michaelle Edwards runs Mana Yoga Center on
Kauai and is a 30+ year bodyworker and yoga teacher. Yogalign places an emphasis on natural body mechanics and movement, fascia, deep core breathing, fluid and natural

movement as well as self-massage and neuro-muscular re-patterning.

I want to combine Yogalign's sound, anatomical principles with my own interest in a fluid, ecstatic yoga practice, as well as a tool for therapy and mind-body healing.

This training is being offered from March 10 - April 18, 2014. It is the only one of its kind planned all year!

www.manayoga.com


The Money

I've raised most of what I need (accommodation, flights, food and living expenses), but I need your help for the rest! Tuition is $3,650 and I'm asking for $2,500 to help cover the rest.


What I Will Give Back

I plan to use my training as yoga therapy for women. I want to bring back the more feminine aspects of yoga as a practice that is: therapeutic, all about deep surrender, free flowing, sensual, and overall an experience of connecting to yourself! Some say that the source of our pain is our disconnection to our selves. Yoga at its root, is about union in every sense of the word.

My studies in Somatic Psychology have been all about how we store all of our experiences in our body, and yoga is an excellent tool for healing, and integrating that mind-body connection.

PLUS, I'm offering great perks to those who donate. In addition to some cool homemade items, I will also be producing a 1 hour long yoga instructional video set in a beautiful outdoor location
column2: in this way it will be more valuable than one class with me
column3:
something you can watch again and again (and learn these important, foundational alignment tools)


Connect With Me

column1:
Any donation is appreciated. If you can't contribute but still want to help, please consider sharing with friends.

If you're interested in my beliefs about somatic healing, empowerment

and connection, I would love if you visited my website (and blog)! I will also be posting ongoing updates and information:

www.bethanylanger.com

Thanks and Love,

Bethany

Our Story
Hello, Rachael &

We started Afrocenchix after meeting at university as teenagers bonding over shared problems with alopecia, skin irritation and ineffective hair care products. Rachael suffers from eczema and a range of allergies so was particularly fed up with the artificial fragrance filled bottles on the market.
Joycelyn studied Sociology and Rachael, Law, so the last thing we imagined is that we'd start the first afro hair care brand to launch in Whole Foods UK!
<ul>

• We have over 20 combined years of industry experience. Rachael studied as a postgrad at the Institute of Trichologists and holds an MSc. Joycelyn wrote a thesis on the social and historical impact of attitudes to afro hair on society and particularly black women.
<li>This campaign will allow us to: complete our safe, cruelty-free, natural and effective product range

• By supporting us you're helping to create a world where the health and beauty needs of black families are met without it being a big deal, a world where ""normal"" no longer means ""white"" and where retail is inclusive.
<h3>What We Need &amp
With £25,000 we will:
<ul>
• Scale up our manufacturing so you get products faster
• Update packaging across the range for better function and aesthetic
• Launch Spring, our 100% natural styling butter
• Complete research and development and cosmetic testing for Swirl, our silicone-free conditioner
Supporters will be first to receive Spring &
column2: Swirl and to try our new subscription service with a few little surprises thrown in.

column1: Perks will be shipped by Autumn 2018: we'll keep you updated so you'll have a precise date as soon as we do.
The Stars of the Show

When we started Afrocenchix, products for afro hair just weren't good enough. Partly because the unique properties of our kinky, curly, coily hair were ignored by major brands, leading to shelves full of products that just didn't work.
Two of the hardest things to formulate with cruelty-free natural ingredients are also two of the most in demand products: conditioner and styling products.

We're pleased to announce Spring, our 100% natural formula enriched with Mango butter and Avocado oil is trialed, tested, vegan certified and ready to launch! It's perfect for twist outs, braid outs and protective styles. Spring provides hold and definition whilst keeping your hair soft and bouncy for days!
<div>
Swirl, our silicone free conditioner, is still under development. We're testing new botanical active ingredients and plant extracts that give a similar silky texture to silicones.

Artificial ingredients such as silicones are effective in conditioning the hair. The problem is that some silicones are bad for our health and many are damaging to the environment, so most naturals choose to avoid them. We've been trying out new silicon-like materials made from shea butter, these esters work in a similar way to artificial silicones and offer great conditioning properties particularly for afro hair. We're almost there! With your support we aim to launch our Swirl trial by the summer.
Our Impact
Your contribution will make a huge difference:
<ul>

• We are revolutionising the black hair industry. Moving it away from profiting on the insecurities of black women by selling us billions of pounds worth of toxic, ineffective products each year. We're changing the industry into one that truly cares and serves, one bottle at a time.

• We've sold thousands of products to hundreds of people all over the globe, we were the first brand for afro hair to launch in Whole Foods UK (after years of searching by the Beauty Buyer) and in 2018 we were awarded BEST NATURAL HAIR BRAND in the BBFAs.
<li>
Afrocenchix has been featured by Buzzfeed, Black Hair Magazine, the BBC, Huff Post, the Voice, London Live,Spell Magazine, the Telegraph &
Testimonials
<h3>Risks &amp

Risks are very low as most of the risk has been dealt with in our first 5 years of research and development and our last 4 years of trading. We've delivered our products to customers worldwide for years and now it's time to complete our range increase our supply to meet the needs of more families.
Our current range is tested &
column2: compliant with EU Regulation 1223/2009 (Cosmetics Regulation) we comply with Good Manufacturing Practice standards and we're registered with the Vegan Society.

column1: Spring, our new styling product, is already prototyped, tested and ready for production. Swirl is 80% there and with this campaign we'll be able to launch it by summer 2018.
We will deliver the same level of quality products, advice and customer service as we have become known for, but faster as we grow our team
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some people just can't contribute, but if you've read this far we know you care and want to help. Here's how:
<ul>
• Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by emailing, texting and telling your friends and family
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word on social media

Thanks for reading!

The Stars of the Show

When we started Afrocenchix, products for afro hair just weren't good enough. Partly because the unique properties of our kinky, curly, coily hair were ignored by major brands, leading to shelves full of products that just didn't work.
Two of the hardest things to formulate with cruelty-free natural ingredients are also two of the most in demand products: conditioner and styling products.

We're pleased to announce Spring, our 100% natural formula enriched with Mango butter and Avocado oil is trialed, tested, vegan certified and ready to launch! It's perfect for twist outs, braid outs and protective styles. Spring provides hold and definition whilst keeping your hair soft and bouncy for days!
Swirl, our silicone free conditioner, is still under development. We're testing new botanical active ingredients and plant extracts that give a similar silky texture to silicones.

Artificial ingredients such as silicones are effective in conditioning the hair. The problem is that some silicones are bad for our health and many are damaging to the environment, so most naturals choose to avoid them. With your support we aim to launch our Swirl trial by the summer.
Our Impact

We are revolutionising the black hair industry. Moving it away from profiting on the insecurities of black women by selling us billions of pounds worth of toxic, ineffective products each year. We're changing the industry into one that truly cares and serves, one bottle at a time.

We've sold thousands of products to hundreds of people all over the globe, we were the first brand for afro hair to launch in Whole Foods UK (after years of searching by the Beauty Buyer) and in 2018 we were awarded BEST NATURAL HAIR BRAND in the BBFAs.
Afrocenchix has been featured by Buzzfeed, Black Hair Magazine, the BBC, Huff Post, the Voice, London Live,Spell Magazine, the Telegraph & other publications.
Testimonials

Risks are very low as most of the risk has been dealt with in our first 5 years of research and development and our last 4 years of trading. We've delivered our products to customers worldwide for years and now it's time to complete our range increase our supply to meet the needs of more families.
Our current range is tested & compliant with EU Regulation 1223/2009 (Cosmetics Regulation) we comply with Good Manufacturing Practice standards and we're registered with the Vegan Society.

Summary

Hello, I'm Shawn McClendon.  I am a personal trainer, fitness blogger and podcaster, and the fitness columnist for The Macon Telegraph.  To make it plain, I am a guy who has a passion for seeing people living vibrant, healthy lives while avoiding unnecessary disease.

On Friday, September 7th, my wife and I are putting on an event called My Doctor is NOT Responsible for my Health...I AM, and this event is going to empower everyone who attends to be conscious of the power they have over their own health, and it's going to supply them with resources to do so.  This event is a partner event with the 5th annual Georgia Wellness and Fitness Festival, the largest event of its kind in the southeast.  There are going to be motivational talks, a group fitness workout led by an awesome celebrity guest, raffles, and resources for every attendee to take home to give them a head start on their fitness journeys.

We are launching this campaign to help us cover some of our expenses, and to make this event truly great and memorable.  Your contributions to help us create a great event will be tremendous and will help us do work we feel called to do.
For more details, visit https://yourhealthatthecrossroads.com/my-doctor-event/
<h3>What We Need &amp
We are raising $10,000 to help us cover event expenses, and we are asking for your contribution of $30 per person.  The expenses will include the following:
<ul>
• Venue
• Bringing our special guest to Macon
• PA System/Sound equipment
• Healthy Snacks (for approx. 200 attendees)
• T-shirts for every contributing attendee
• Goodie bags (for approx. 200 attendees) and raffle prizes
• Event advertisements (Online ads, radio ads, flyers, etc.)
• Venue decorations
For your contribution of at least $30, you will get the following:
<ul>
• A ticket to the event with priority seating
• A My Doctor is NOT Responsible for my Health...I AM t-shirt
• An opportunity for a pre-event meet-and-greet with our special celebrity guest (for the first 50 contributors)

In the event that we did not reach our goal of $10,000, we would either do our event in a scaled-down fashion with the money we do raise, or we would use it for a future health/fitness community event.
The Impact

Georgia is among the top 10 unhealthiest states in America, which is unfortunate enough.  What's worse is that our county, Macon-Bibb, is among the top 25 unhealthiest counties in the state.  So, needless to say, we're in very bad shape.

While healthcare is part of the solution, it is by no means the solution to our issues with very high levels of preventable disease occurring among our population.  Doctors cannot decide for us what we will put in our mouths, whether or not we will exercise, or if we get enough sleep or sunlight.  We have to decide these things, and this type of mindset is what we seek to perpetuate through this event.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some may not be able to contribute financially, but still want to help.  If that is you, here's what you can do to support us:
<ul>
<li>

Share, share SHARE:  Share this Indiegogo campaign on your social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), via e-mail, or even through a phone call.  Tell your friends about the event and how they can support a movement
<li>

Join our 10,000 hills challenge:  As a part of our campaign, we have challenged ourselves to run 10,000 hill sprints leading up to the event, and we challenge you to do the same.  Find a hill in your community, and commit to walking/sprinting up that hill a certain number of times every week, and post a picture of you doing it on your social media with hashtags #iamresponsibleYHATC and #10000togetherYHATC.  We would greatly appreciate it.
Thank you in advance for your consideration, and God bless.

While healthcare is part of the solution, it is by no means the solution to our issues with very high levels of preventable disease occurring among our population.  Doctors cannot decide for us what we will put in our mouths, whether or not we will exercise, or if we get enough sleep or sunlight.  We have to decide these things, and this type of mindset is what we seek to perpetuate through this event.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some may not be able to contribute financially, but still want to help.  If that is you, here's what you can do to support us:

Share, share SHARE:  Share this Indiegogo campaign on your social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), via e-mail, or even through a phone call.  Tell your friends about the event and how they can support a movement

Join our 10,000 hills challenge:  As a part of our campaign, we have challenged ourselves to run 10,000 hill sprints leading up to the event, and we challenge you to do the same.  Find a hill in your community, and commit to walking/sprinting up that hill a certain number of times every week, and post a picture of you doing it on your social media with hashtags #iamresponsibleYHATC and #10000togetherYHATC.  We would greatly appreciate it.
Thank you in advance for your consideration, and God bless.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Macon, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/iamresponsibleyhatc-support-the-event/pica

Break Through the Patient Language Barrier

As paramedics and first responders, we need to be able to communicate with patients to gain their trust, accurately assess their illness or injury, and provide the most appropriate treatments. But when they don't speak English, this can be a significant barrier to care.
The Emergency Medical Translator is designed to break through the language barrier and give you the ability to quickly and accurately communicate with your patient.
Designed specifically for paramedics and medical first responders, the Emergency Medical Translator contains:
<ul>
• Questions and phrases based on pre-hospital patient assessment.
• 9 language translations with over 300 words in each.
• 11 pages of symbols and diagrams with over 200 graphics.
• Language identification guide.
• Reference and conversions with built in ruler.
9 Languages - Questions and statements in English with nine additional translations: Punjabi, Chinese, Korean, Persian (Farsi), Spanish, Arabic, French, Hindi, and Vietnamese.
Made from hard-wearing, super-lightweight plastic to be durable yet light, and designed to fit in almost any uniform pocket.
Point. Don't Pronounce

Every question and graphic is designed so you can simply point at the translator and look for the reaction from the patient. You don't need to attempt difficult pronunciation, speeding up translation and reducing errors.
<h3>Lightweight &amp
The plastic construction prevents tearing, will not crease, and is lighter than a paper lamination combination.  It is also waterproof and you can write on it with dry erase markers!
When You Need it the Most
Conveniently sized at just 14.5cm x 9.5 cm (5 3/4"" x 3 3/4"") the Emergency Medical Translator booklet is designed to fit in your uniform shirt pockets, cargo pockets, or your back pocket.
The booklet weighs under 100g (3.5 oz) making it very lightweight for its size.
How Does it Work?
Quick and easy. No pronunciations required.
Just point and observe the patient’s responses.
<ul>
• First locate the language of your patient by showing the patient the list of languages and flags.
• Next, go to the page with the desired language.
• Flip the two outside English language covers over the inside target language pages.
• Identify the English translation using the number.
• Flip up the cover.
• Point to the corresponding word or phrase of the target language translation so the patient can see.
• Look for the patient’s reaction.
Most questions prompt a yes/no answer or for the patient to point to their injury site.
In other questions you can refer to the symbol section in the second half of the booklet to aid in obtaining answers.
<h3>Symbols &amp
11 additional pages of descriptive symbols and diagrams to aid with situational awareness, injury cause, and medical history taking from non-English speaking patients.
These sections include:
<ul>
• signs and symptoms
• injury causes
• bites and stings
• allergies and poisons
• falls and crashes
• medications and medical procedures.
<h3>Reference &amp
Use the handy built in ruler showing both centimetres/millimetres, and inches.
Conversion charts include:
<ul>
• Metres to feet
• Kilometres per hour to miles per hour
• Celsius to Fahrenheit
• Kilograms to Pounds
Three pages of reference and conversion diagrams include time, colours, weather, numbers, letters, math calculations, and more.
Easy to Clean
The Emergency Medical Translator is made from 100% synthetic materials that will not be damaged by medical disinfectants such as Metrex Cavi Wipes or Accel PREVention RTU Wipes.
Other Ways You Can Help
Backers are needed to help turn this project into a reality.
If you're not a medical responder but you believe this product can help, there are two ways you can help:
<ol>
<li>
Share the Campaign - tell your friends, share on social media. Get the word out!
<li>
Donate - by clicking the Back It button, you can donate to help us reach our funding goal and get the Emergency Medical Translator in the hands of those who need it.
Thank you!!!!

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""> <h3>
Valentine’s day is day of love. On 14 February 2015, a group of 5 courageous women with a conviction we can make a difference, will start our seven day ascent to the
5,895m high mountain of Kilimanjaro for the love of all those that suffer from
cancer. Join us in our plight to fight the cancer sufferings and help us
fundraise USD $5,895 to help underprivileged chemotherapy patients to go
through this ghastly treatment in dignity!

column5: >Each one of us was touched by cancer though a personal loss or that of our friends. Through this challenge we want to celebrate the lives of those we lost and give hope to those that are battling the disease.
column9: >Through this campaign we want to raise funds for a charity back home whose mission is to battle cancer in every day life. My dear friends
column13: >Kiki and Ljiljana are battling the breast

column1: cancer. They have experienced the ghastly effects of chemo that weakens the
entire body, causes constant sickness and diarrhea, affect the skin, nails, body
cells, and make you loose your hair. They want us to support the charity that cares for women in their shoes.
Breast cancer association “Sve za nju” http://www.svezanju.hr, provides facilities
for patients coming from low income families and provide them the accommodation
and psychosocial support during the time of their chemo treatments in the
capital. <span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: >Please help us help them to go though this horrific

column1: treatment in dignity!
We will be walking for seven days to the top of Kilimanjaro,
the mountain desired to be conquered by the founder of “Sve za nju” Vesna
Andrijevic Matovac, who succumbed to the illness before being able to climb it
herself. Help us raise one dollar for each meter of our plight and make the “walk
through the thorn road of cancer treatment” easier for those entire unknown
woman who are too poor to afford to do it themselves!
Join us in the Kilimanjaro for cancer care fight today!

The trouble comes unbidden. Cancer  is the most difficult challenge that a person can go through. In this case the person needs a huge moral support, and also money. It is hard to say which is more important. 

Irina Ungurean (born 1978) HAS cancer and needs repeated treatment. 

Irina Ungurean raises her  8 year-old daughter all by herself. She is an accountant. She lives with his mother and brother in Balti, Moldova.

In 2012, after the first operation, the required amount of money for treatment abroad was collected to help Irene. Unfortunately, in September of 2014 Irina's condition suddenly worsened. Currently Irene is going through chemical therapy in Balti Municipal Hospital.
Together we can help to Irina Ungurean to overcome this ordeal.
For more information please contact - ttv66@mail.ru
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1508613346049676/
Site: http://ajutamungureanirina.blogspot.com/

Sigma Alpha Mu’s National Philanthropy is The Judy Fund, which is part of The Alzheimer’s Association. The Judy Fund was established by a Sigma Alpha Mu member, Marshall Gelfand, in honor of his wife who lost a nine-year battle to the Alzheimer’s disease in 2004. The money raised for the Judy Fund is used to support the research, care, and advocacy efforts by the Alzheimer’s Association. The Alzheimer's Association is the leading global voluntary health organization in Alzheimer's care and support, and the largest private, nonprofit funder of Alzheimer's research.
Sigma Alpha Mu strays from the stereotypes that are a stigma with Greek life. We strive to better the world through our community service efforts and academic integrity.

For the fourth year, Sigma Alpha Mu at ASU will host its annual Paint Splash event. In this event, teams raise money for the Judy Fund while competing in different tournaments. The week of philanthropy ends with an all-out paint war consisting of more than 1,000 paint balloons and 200 guests.
The week's events include: Penny Wars and a raffle, both of which will be held on the week of Nov. 2
column2: the Alzheimer's Association Walk, on Nov. 8 at 9 a.m.
column3:
multiple percentage nights at restaurants TBA and the actual Paint Splash event, on Nov. 8 at 11:00 a.m.
From this website, we hope to raise $1500 while raising an extra $3000 from the Paint Splash week itself. Any help is appreciated!

Short Summary:

As kids, we loved to play sports, and we were always fortunate enough to have access to the proper equipment. Unfortunately, many around the world are not so lucky. We’d love for all children to have the same great experience we had
column2: that’s why we’ve made it our goal to supply them with proper equipment.

column1: What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We need funding to defray the costs of our international shipments. Any money you give us will go towards supplying the sixty children at the Casa Victoria orphanage in Ecuador. For any donation over $5 you will receive an acknowledgement on our website (www.one4theteam.com) under the sponsors page. If you wish to remain anonymous, then please contact us at info@one4theteam.com. For a $65 donation, you will receive a T - shirt. For a $25 donation, you will receive a One for the Team coffee mug, and finally for a $75 dollar donation, you will receive every single perk.   

The Impact

Sport are a very important activity in a child's life. Luckily, for most people in America, they have the opportunity to play sports if they so choose. However many children across the world do not have this same opportunity. That is where we come in. Your donations will give children this amazing opportunity.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to make a donation, it would be greatly appreciated if you could help get the word out. Posting on social media such as Instagram Twitter, and Facebook to help spread the word would be a considerable help.
